data.name: Okoye
data.description: The general of the Dora Milaje who uses precision attacks to break down enemy defenses.

starItems.name: Okoye
starItems.description: The general of the Dora Milaje who uses precision attacks to break down enemy defenses.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to clear a positive effect.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target 
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to clear a positive effect

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear a positive effect.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target 
Always clear a positive effect

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + clear a positive effect.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear a positive effect.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Extra Focus for this attack

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.
Gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Always apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, reduce Speed Bar of all targets with <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> by <color=#86e619>35%</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, reduce Speed Bar of all targets with <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> by <color=#86e619>35%</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, reduce Speed Bar of all targets with <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> by <color=#86e619>35%</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description:
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be dodged.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> allies, this attack cannot be Blocked.

2.description:
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be dodged.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> allies, this attack cannot be Blocked.

3.description:
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be dodged.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> allies, this attack cannot be Blocked.

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be dodged.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> allies, this attack cannot be Blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing
Reduce Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>20%</color>
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be dodged.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> allies, this attack cannot be Blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be dodged.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> allies, this attack cannot be Blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, clear Revive Once from the primary target, this clear cannot be resisted

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
Lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > Clear Revive Once from the primary target. This clear cannot be resisted.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy.

This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and cannot be dodged.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAR DOG</color> allies, this attack cannot be Blocked.

1.description:
On <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

On self or <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, on <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies

2.description:
On <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies.

On self or <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, while <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies, lower Damage by <color=#86e619>15%</color> for all enemies

3.description:
On <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies.

On self or <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally's turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, while <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies:
> Lower Damage by <color=#86e619>15%</color> for all enemies.
3.nextUpgrade:
Always gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, while <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies, gain <color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed for self and all <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies

4.description:
On <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies.

On self or <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally's turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, while <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies:
> Lower Damage by <color=#86e619>15%</color> for all enemies.
> Gain <color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed for self and all <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, while <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies, lower Drain by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for all enemies

5.description:
On <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>. In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to all <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies.

On self or <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally Crit, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> ally's turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> or <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, while <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, and if this character has <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies:
> Lower Damage by <color=#86e619>15%</color> for all enemies.
> Gain <color=#86e619>20%</color> Speed for self and all <color=#fff568>WAKANDAN</color> allies.
> Lower Drain by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for all enemies.
